title: (x) Nestlé Food Services - Poppl Laudatio {Skylar Fein, Erik S}
content:
hi there,

can anyone please id the “FoodServices” Font used in the attached screen?

Thanks, Florian

 [‹ NEW! Type ID Pop Quiz V2.1 - Expert Level](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202144529/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27994 "Go to previous forum topic") [petr? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202144529/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29028 "Go to next forum topic")
author: flinhardt

comments.content:
So is Formata Medium Italic squooshed.

Nick Cooke
Hm. Seems to be a hard one, right? I think both of them are a bit too far away...
I’d say this is [Laudatio](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202144529/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/laudatio-bq/medium/), skewed and horizontally scaled.
That should be **Poppl** Laudatio, but a certain supplier doesn’t pay licenses for this face, so the originator’s name had to go.

Argh! Of course! How could I’ve missed that!?

Oh, but wait, that must be my ethical sense diverting my attention away from _The Trigger-Happy Rascal Whose Lawyers All Drive Rolls Royces And Own Private Jets._
